member.name: T:Omrlib.Communication.ModbusInfo.ExceptionCode
member.summary: Exception code(Exception response from the driver)

member.name: F:Omrlib.Communication.ModbusInfo.ExceptionCode.NOERROR
member.summary: No error

member.name: F:Omrlib.Communication.ModbusInfo.ExceptionCode.INVALID_FUNCTION
member.summary:
The process could not be executed because the function code was invalid.
The function code is not supported.
The sub-function code for diagnosis (08h) is other than 00h.

member.name: F:Omrlib.Communication.ModbusInfo.ExceptionCode.INVALID_DATAADDRESS
member.summary:
The process could not be executed because the data address was invalid.
The address is not supported (other than 0000h to 1FFFh).
Register address and number of registers are 2000h or more in total.

member.name: F:Omrlib.Communication.ModbusInfo.ExceptionCode.INVALID_DATA
member.summary:
The process could not be executed because the data was invalid.
The number of registers is 0 or more than 17.
The number of bytes is other than twice the number of registers.
The data length is outside the specified range.

member.name: F:Omrlib.Communication.ModbusInfo.ExceptionCode.SLAVE_ERROR
member.summary:
The process could not be executed because an error occurred at the slave.
Downloading, initializing or teaching function is in progress using the OPX-2A
Downloading or initialization is in progress using the MEXE02
Internal processing was in progress. (S-BSY is ON.)
An EEPROM error alarm was present.
Outside the parameter setting range
Command execute disable

member.summary: Output when the motor is within the area specified by each operation data.

member.summary: Output once every 7.2° rotation of the motor output shaft based on command position.

member.summary: Output if the motor is in the origin which is on the wrap coordinates when the warp function is enabled.

member.summary: Turns ON every one round based on the feedback position.

item.description: “I/O test” of the MEXE02 has been performed.
“Teaching remote operation“ of the MEXE02 was activated.

member.name: P:Omrlib.Products.AZSeries.AzInternalIO.INFO_ODO
member.summary: Odometer of the motor exceeded the value set in the “Odometer information (INFO-ODO)” parameter.

member.name: P:Omrlib.Products.AZSeries.AzInternalIO.INFO_TRIP
member.summary: Tripmeter of the motor exceeded the value set in the “Tripmeter information (INFO-TRIP)” parameter.

member.name: P:Omrlib.Products.AZSeries.AzInternalIO.INFO_CULD1
member.summary: Cumulative load exceeded the value set in the “Cumulative load information (INFO-CULD1)” parameter.

member.name: P:Omrlib.Products.AZSeries.AzInternalIO.INFO_CULD0
member.summary: Cumulative load exceeded the value set in the “Cumulative load information (INFO-CULD0)” parameter.

member.name: P:Omrlib.Products.AZSeries.AzInternalIO.INFO_RV_OT
member.summary: Negative software limit was detected, or either one of the RV-LS input and RV-BLK input turned ON.

member.name: P:Omrlib.Products.AZSeries.AzInternalIO.INFO_FW_OT
member.summary: Positive software limit was detected, or either one of the FW-LS input and FWBLK input turned ON.

member.name: P:Omrlib.Products.AZSeries.AzInternalIO.INFO_NET_E
member.summary: RS-485 communication error was detected.

member.name: P:Omrlib.Products.AZSeries.AzInternalIO.INFO_RND_E
member.summary: The resolution and "wrap setting range" parameter was inconsistent.

member.name: P:Omrlib.Products.AZSeries.AzInternalIO.INFO_EGR_E
member.summary: Resolution set in the “electronic gear” parameter was out of specification.

member.name: P:Omrlib.Products.AZSeries.AzInternalIO.INFO_PR_REQ
member.summary: Preset has been executed by position preset or return-to-home operation.

member.name: P:Omrlib.Products.AZSeries.AzInternalIO.INFO_ZHOME
member.summary: Turn on the ZHOME input without the setting the coordinate(ABSPEN output is OFF)

item.description: Start input of prohibited direction has been turned ON.
When the operation cannot be executed, start signal has been turned ON. Example) the READY output is OFF

member.name: P:Omrlib.Products.AZSeries.AzInternalIO.INFO_SPD
member.summary: The detected motor speed exceeded the value set in the “speed information” parameter.

member.name: P:Omrlib.Products.AZSeries.AzInternalIO.INFO_OLTIME
member.summary: A load exceeding the maximum torque was applied for the time set in parameter for the overload time information or longer.

item.description: The power supply voltage dropped from the value set in the parameter for undervoltage.
The main power was cut off momentarily or the voltage became low.
The voltage of the power supply exceeded the value set in the "over voltage information" parameter.
A large inertial load was stopped abruptly or vertical operation was performed.

member.name: P:Omrlib.Products.AZSeries.AzInternalIO.INFO_MTRTMP
member.summary: Detected encoder temperature exceeded the value set in the “motor temperature information” parameter.

member.name: P:Omrlib.Products.AZSeries.AzInternalIO.INFO_DRVTMP
member.summary: Driver internal temperature exceeded the value set in the “driver temperature information” parameter.

member.name: P:Omrlib.Products.AZSeries.AzInternalIO.INFO_POSERR
member.summary: Position deviation between the command position and feedback position exceeds the value set in the “overflow rotation information”.

member.name: P:Omrlib.Products.AZSeries.AzInternalIO.INFO_USRIO
member.summary: The I/O set in the “INFO-B0 output selection” parameter turns ON.

member.name: T:Omrlib.Communication.ModbusInfo.ErrorCode
member.summary: Error Code. Each function of the return value.

member.name: F:Omrlib.Communication.ModbusInfo.ErrorCode.ERROR_NONE
member.summary: Error is not.

member.name: F:Omrlib.Communication.ModbusInfo.ErrorCode.ERROR_UNKNOWN
member.summary: Undefined error.

member.name: F:Omrlib.Communication.ModbusInfo.ErrorCode.ERROR_FRAMELENGTH
member.summary: Frame length is abnormal.

member.name: F:Omrlib.Communication.ModbusInfo.ErrorCode.ERROR_DIFFERENT_SLAVEADDRESS
member.summary: Slave address is different.

member.name: F:Omrlib.Communication.ModbusInfo.ErrorCode.ERROR_UNKNOWN_FUNCTIONCODE
member.summary: Unknown Function code.

member.name: F:Omrlib.Communication.ModbusInfo.ErrorCode.ERROR_CRC
member.summary: Anomaly of the CRC.

member.name: F:Omrlib.Communication.ModbusInfo.ErrorCode.ERROR_RESPONSEFRAME
member.summary: Response frame is abnormal.

member.name: F:Omrlib.Communication.ModbusInfo.ErrorCode.ERROR_TIMEOUT_SEND
member.summary: Time-out of the transmission occurs.

member.name: F:Omrlib.Communication.ModbusInfo.ErrorCode.ERROR_TIMEOUT_RECEIVE
member.summary: Time-out of the reception occurs.

member.name: F:Omrlib.Communication.ModbusInfo.ErrorCode.ERROR_FAIL_INITSERIALTHREAD
member.summary: An error occurred when initializing the thread of serial communication.

member.name: F:Omrlib.Communication.ModbusInfo.ErrorCode.ERROR_OCCUREXCEPTION_SERIAL
member.summary: An error occurred when processing of serial communication.

member.name: F:Omrlib.Communication.ModbusInfo.ErrorCode.ERROR_SERIALPORTNAME
member.summary: Port name is abnormal.

member.name: F:Omrlib.Communication.ModbusInfo.ErrorCode.ERROR_PORTHANDLE
member.summary: Failed to get the port handle.

member.name: F:Omrlib.Communication.ModbusInfo.ErrorCode.ERROR_COMMUNICATIONBUFFER
member.summary: Failed to set send and receive buffer.

member.name: F:Omrlib.Communication.ModbusInfo.ErrorCode.ERROR_CLEARCOMMUNICATIONBUFFER
member.summary: Failed to clear send and receive buffer.

member.name: F:Omrlib.Communication.ModbusInfo.ErrorCode.ERROR_SETSERIALSTATE
member.summary: Failed to set the status.

member.name: F:Omrlib.Communication.ModbusInfo.ErrorCode.ERROR_SETSERIALTIMEOUT
member.summary: Failed to set the time-out.

member.name: F:Omrlib.Communication.ModbusInfo.ErrorCode.ERROR_OCCUREXCEPTION_SERIALINIT
member.summary: An error occurred when initialize the serial communication.

member.name: F:Omrlib.Communication.ModbusInfo.ErrorCode.ERROR_SERIALPORTNOTOPEN
member.summary: Port is not open.

member.name: F:Omrlib.Communication.ModbusInfo.ErrorCode.ERROR_RECEIVETHREAD
member.summary: An error occurred when running the thread of the reception.

member.name: F:Omrlib.Communication.ModbusInfo.ErrorCode.ERROR_FAIL_GETSEMAPHORE
member.summary: Failed to get the semaphore.

member.name: F:Omrlib.Communication.ModbusInfo.ErrorCode.ERROR_NOT_OPERATION
member.summary: The driver side is not in operation possible state.

member.name: F:Omrlib.Communication.ModbusInfo.ErrorCode.ERROR_INPROGRESS_COMMAND
member.summary: Other command is running.

member.name: F:Omrlib.Communication.ModbusInfo.ErrorCode.ERROR_INPROGRESS_SERIALPORT
member.summary: During communication.

member.name: F:Omrlib.Communication.ModbusInfo.ErrorCode.ERROR_UNKNOWN_EXCEPTIONCODE
member.summary: Unknown Exception Code

member.name: F:Omrlib.Communication.ModbusInfo.ErrorCode.ERROR_BROADCAST
member.summary: Can not be broadcast.

member.name: F:Omrlib.Communication.ModbusInfo.ErrorCode.ERROR_NOTEXECUTE_PORTOPEN
